target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXCompilerInstance.h)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXCompilerInvocation.h)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXFrontendOptions.h)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXTextDiagnosticPrinter.h)
